Assault Engine

General Information

Base price 500 points
Equipment Assault Engine

Overview

Albians are a race of humanoids in Pordier who are most alike to humans. They have no additional features, and have natural human skin tones and hair colors.

Appearance

In-game, the Rostoran uniform is reddish-grey.

Trivia

  • Oskovia used to also fight Rostora in the old Umbral map...
  • Soldiers wear the same helmet models as Rostora...
